H0.text: Methane is the predominant component that makes up natural gas.

H1.text: Hydrogen is the predominant component that makes up natural gas.

H2.text: Carbon is the predominant component of natural gas.

H3.text: Sulfur is the predominant component that makes up natural gas.

A4.text: Natural gas is primarily methane (95%), small amounts of higher alkanes, and traces of carbon dioxide and nitrogen, hydrogen sulfide and helium.

A5.text: Hydrogen sulfide is present in trace amounts in natural gas.
